description: Our Community Centre, an inspiring space nestled within the Energy Hub at Elephant Park, stands as a beacon of innovation and sustainability, anchored by a state-of-the-art design. This cutting-edge building not only serves the residents and businesses of Elephant Park with net zero-carbon heat and hot water but also provides a dynamic and engaging environment for community activities and events.

events.name: Drop in: Community Space Talk & Book Exchange
events.notes: Weather permitting, we'll open our sliding doors, play Afro House on our Dolby system—and if live performers are available, they’ll join too

factsheet.heading: More than a Community Centre
paragraphs: Our Community Centre at the Energy Hub is more than just a space; it is a place where innovation meets tradition, a symbol of sustainability, invention, and community resilience. It is a living, breathing hub of creativity, connection, and culture.

In addition to offering our space for hire, we curate a wide range of activities and events designed to enrich the fabric of our community. From educational workshops and cultural events to fitness classes and social gatherings, our programming reflects the diverse interests and needs of our residents. Our goal is to foster a sense of belonging and provide opportunities for personal and communal growth.

We invite you to come and see for yourself and be struck by its stunning design, a space that is both inviting and inspiring. The use of natural light, sustainable materials, and innovative design elements showcases the best of contemporary architecture while paying homage to our rich heritage. 
And no visit to our community centre would be complete without stopping by our delightful café for a refreshing drink or delicious cake and sit down with friends or meet new people while enjoying the cosy ambiance and great music.

name: Melanin Health & Wellness Community Centre @ The Trunk
